name: buisness rivals
description:
business rivals is a game that you play as a entrepreneur who starts of his business you slowly gain more money gain more popularity and then use the money to gain more money and popularity but then the entrepreneur got bored of waiting around earning $2.50 an hour so he found his main rivals the person behind him and the two people in front of him in the competition and robbed them

there are five different ways to rob people depending on whom you are robbing

a-platformer

b-puzzle

c-finding safe codes

d-smash and grab

f-race

the controls are

in building view-

up and down keys to move up and down

click on tower segments to go to the room where you click on a factory to buy it

click on the elevator suspended by red wire to travel to different floors quickly

backspace to exit rooms

s to save game file

platformer raid-

arrow keys to move

space key to jump

also the level is designed so you have to glitch to the end to win

puzzle raid-

click and b key to place blue wire

click and r key to place red wire

click and y key to place yellow wire

click and g key to place green wire

click and p key to place pink wire

click and w key to place white wire

furniture raid-

click on sheets labeled 1,2,3 and 4

to get code click on safe to enter code

car raid-

click on as much money as you can

then exit by clicking the sign with an arrow within 3 seconds

race car raid-

space to speed up

backspace to slow down

arrow keys to move
